resources.string: The current version has been the latest.

您尚未安装微信客户端，请下载安装后使用该功能

" neoShare is a type of photo application for social communications. With neoShare, you can interact with other users by sharing, following, commenting and praising. No matter whether you are on a trip or in your leisure time, neoShare is always being with you to record the wonderful moments and flowing memories, and share your discoveries and feelings with the whole world! "
"Version: V%s Development team: nubia development team Official website: www.nubia.cn Problem feedback: nubiaapp@nubia.cn : Contact nubia team@nubia.cn Copyright©2010–2014 All Rights Reserved"
The authorization of your QQ account has expired. Please authorize again and login
The authorization of your Sina Weibo has expired. Please authorize again and login
I have found many beautiful photos in neoShare and I’d like to invite you to take a look at them. Download from here: %1$s; I am %2$s, please remember to follow me.
Users need login again due to upgrade of server. Sorry for all the inconveniences caused.
File error, please check if your phone storage is full or try again after clearing cache.
"The latest version V%1$s has been released, so your version V%2$s doesn't support any longer. Please download to upgrade and explore with more surprises."

"A validation E-mail has been sent to your E-mail address %s, please log into your mailbox and follow the instructions to operate. If you haven't received the E-mail, please check if it has been blocked or not."
*Note: No more than 12 photos can be uploaded at a time, and each contestant can upload twice at most; Do not forward or download after uploading your works and keep your original works well.
